data.title: 1635: The Cannon Law
data.meta_description: 1635: The Cannon Law (Baen, 2006) by Eric Flint and Andrew Dennis is the second novel in the Southern European thread of the 1632 series, which began with 1634: The Galileo Affair. The book explores the reactions of the Roman Catholic hardliners to Pope Urban VIII's decisions to tolerate the...
data.text:
1635: The Cannon Law Author Eric FlintCo-Author Andrew DennisLanguage EnglishSeries 1632 seriesGenre(s) Alternate HistoryPublisher BaenPublication date September 26, 2006Preceded by 1634: The Bavarian CrisisFollowed by Ring of Fire II

1635: The Cannon Law (Baen, 2006) by Eric Flint and Andrew Dennis is the second novel in the Southern European thread of the 1632 series, which began with 1634: The Galileo Affair.
